channel.title: Frustrated please help!
channel.description: Alright... this is how it started I wanted to make a new server so i went through the tutorial and i got a source then i got a client because client.silabsoft.org never works it started to work fine and my client was working fine everything was perfect but then it woudn't let me compile I went through the tutorial again and again with the system thing were u go to advance and envoriment variables so i made the variables my 1st 1 for users variables was CLASSPATH then the value was CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03 and then for my PATH the value was C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin and then i just coppied it over to the system variables and it just kept saying cant find path specefied so then im like grr mybe i need to reinstall my java so i reinstall it and then my client wasnt freakin workin btw my server source is funz pkz v4 and my client is teh icerealm client....alright so everytime i tried to load my client it would say Java is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file and im like wtf so i reinstall icerealm and it still said it so now my client dosnt work my server works but i still cant compile it please help me any post could help please...

item.title: Frustrated please help!
item.dc:creator: @Cool_aint_it1 Cool aint it
item.description:
@Cool_aint_it1 wrote:

can you be more specific then that man? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2008, 09:09:57 AM[/size][hr]omfg can someone please help? im very frustrated and pissed off and posts like burninsilence’s posts piss me off any more i need direct instructions because all of this is complicated to me can someone please help me or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Frustrated please help!
item.dc:creator: @Cool_aint_it1 Cool aint it
item.description:
@Cool_aint_it1 wrote:

Alright… this is how it started I wanted to make a new server so i went through the tutorial and i got a source then i got a client because client.silabsoft.org never works it started to work fine and my client was working fine everything was perfect but then it woudn’t let me compile I went through the tutorial again and again with the system thing were u go to advance and envoriment variables so i made the variables my 1st 1 for users variables was CLASSPATH then the value was CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03 and then for my PATH the value was C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin and then i just coppied it over to the system variables and it just kept saying cant find path specefied so then im like grr mybe i need to reinstall my java so i reinstall it and then my client wasnt freakin workin btw my server source is funz pkz v4 and my client is teh icerealm client…alright so everytime i tried to load my client it would say Java is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file and im like wtf so i reinstall icerealm and it still said it so now my client dosnt work my server works but i still cant compile it please help me any post could help please…

Read full topic
